For the extremely reasonable rate compared to other hotels and the newness of the rooms, finding The Draper helped made our visit even better.

title: Great hotel
text:
What's good:
- Location is great - close to the metro. It is on the corner of 5th Avenue and 37th street, so you can basically reach many attractions by walk or also use bus (very close bus stops).
- It is a perfectly clean hotel - didn’t have to ask for cleaning or towels or anything related. They cleaned every day with a high quality.
- The bed is very comfy! It is soft and looks like a memory foam style.
- Had a fridge which worked perfectly.
- Shower was great.
- Hairdryer, shower gel, body lotion and hair conditioner were provided.
- Nice staff.
- Possible late checkout and early check in.
- Free bag storage if needed.
- Elevator is very fast.
- It is a very calm place - great soundproofing. Very quiet!
- Nice design in the room and in common areas.
- Wifi (free) worked perfectly in all areas.

Areas of improvement:
- I was a solo traveler, that said I felt comfortable in the room. However, if you are a couple or a family, you might feel that the room is small. But that’s the case for many hotels in NY and you can see the size while booking the room, so can’t complain about that.
- Having a laundry room and gym would be good.
- No bathrobe and slippers provided.

title: A great location with an accommodating staff and very clean feel to the property.!
text: The cleanliness, the staff, and the location of this hotel are things I valued most. I felt the sheets and bathrooms were properly cleaned. The staff remembered my name every time I walked in, which made me felt welcomed and at home. And the hotel is equidistant to Timesquare and Grand Central Station putting its guest in prime position to explore the city.

title: Canceled our booking due to over booking two hours before our checkin
text: We were driving to NYC and about 2 hours away when we received a call from our other party that was staying at the hotel as well. They told us that the hotel had canceled their reservation and most likely canceled ours as well. We had to pull off on a random exit in Pennsylvania and figure out the issue with barely any service. Sure enough we were canceled, however, we did not receive a call. Just an email. We had to find a new hotel on a whim and change our parking plans all on the side of the road in Pennsylvania. On top of it all they gave us an accommodation recommendation that they would use our reservation money to pay for. This sounded great, however, they recommended the YMCA, a $10 a night hostel nearby. We are and always will be furious about the way they handled their first month of being open.

title: Increíble experiencia!!!
text: La atención de Ali y Jenny increíble muy serviciales y el hotel hermoso. Muy nuevo y cuando llegamos y pedimos información nos atendieron muy bien. Excelente ubicación y el edificio y mobiliario muy nuevo, un hotel que se abrió hace muy poco. Totalmente recomendable !!!!

title: incredible experience at The Draper.
text: excellent hotel choice in midtown. the staff was very friendly, kind, and resourceful. We had a problem with our reservation and they made everything to solve this issue. it was a great time in New York and part of that was because of this hotel and the whole staff.

title: Excellent new hotel in midtown!!!
text:
Very clean, bright and modern hotel.
They have a lounge area and patio that we enjoyed during our stay. Location was perfect. Most of the spots we went to were walking distance. 
We will definitely stay here again.

title: Friendly staff and great decor
text: Ayman and the rest of the staff was very friendly and treated us very well. It was a nice stay, clean room and great location. We were welcomed very well and were explained how everything works right from the bat. Recommend this hotel!

title: Don’t book here unless you’re ok sleeping on the street instead.
text: Hotel canceled our reservation DAY OF. I wouldn’t recommend booking at such a disorganized and irresponsible business. Get your sh$t together. You left travelers stranded with no attempt to right your wrongs and try to make amends. What a joke.

title: Stay away!! If this is the way they treat customers!
text: Warning zero customer compassion! We booked through Booking.com and were set for a NY getaway. NOPE they canceled our reservation at 5:40am. We woke up around 7 ish and thank goodness I checked my email. Canceled with an apology of “sorry we overbooked”. Stay far away from this hotel and for that matter Booking.com. The solution they offered was a hotel in New Jersey. Seriously that’s what they could do for me? When you treat customers like this your business is doomed!

title: Don’t Book Here They Always OverBook !
text: Hotel over booked and didn’t honor my reservation. The manager Ali is very insensitive, hung up the phone on me and the booking portal that I used. It’s a shame that this hotel just opened and the lack of customer service is appalling. I’m glad I called 24 hours before I arrived, they canceled without no notice or due diligence. If I could give zero stars I sure would !

title: Incredibly disappointing
text: I was incredibly disappointed with my experience at this establishment. Upon arrival, my group and I were very excited to check in and explore the city. When we arrived at 8:30 am, reservations in hand, we were informed that our reservation had been cancelled, with ABSOLUTELY ZERO notification and ZERO reimbursement. Being 8 hours away from home, with no vehicle, this was quite the blow. The staff expressed no remorse for our situation what so ever and flippantly dismissed our group- practically kicking us off of their sidewalk as we attempted to make other arrangements. I have never witnessed such blatant disregard for customer service. I can not stress this enough, DO NOT BOOK AT THIS HOTEL!

title: Beautiful, new boutique hotel in the heart of Manhattan
text:
I booked this hotel 3 days after it opened! I wasn’t sure what to expect, but I ended up being very impressed. The room, though not huge, was beautifully decorated and spotlessly clean. The bed was one of the most comfy I’ve ever had in a hotel. The bathroom was modern and stylish. And the value for money was excellent too. 

Pros: brand new, great location, comfortable bedding, nice bathrooms, cute furnishings

Cons: rooms are a bit on the smaller side
